title: Some Interesting Numerals
content:
Found this on a building in Pittsburgh. Probably custom, but thought it was neat.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131024012250im_/http:/typophile.com/files/0411081053a_6729.jpg)
author: paulstonier

comments.content:
The '4's are different widths, so yes, it's custom.

- Lex
Yes, I noticed a few differences between them, but seemed like it may have been based on an existing face.
